alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 01 at 1:53PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of south central Nevada, including the following areas, Northeastern Nye County and Northwestern Nye County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Strong thunderstorms will have the potential to generate heavy rain with rates of 1 to 2 inches an hour. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County
